mods.abstract: The Christian Brothers' football teams--varsity and freshmen--for 1950 were celebrated at a banquet at the Colonial Country Club. Special awards were given to: VARSITY John "Buddy" Leake, most valuable player Eddie Moran, best back Joe "Buzzy" Kallaher and Charlie Caldwell, best linemen Ed Boywid, best spirit FRESHMEN Robert Dratnal, most valuable player Eddie Crenshaw, best spirit
